pageContent: Objectives: To investigate a comprehensive geriatric assessment (CGA) with subsequent investigation of healthcare patterns in older patients with urological cancers undergoing initial surgery or radiotherapy, to verify the usefulness of the incorporation of geriatric principles in future care plans.

metaData.source:
Survivors' perspectives on the impact of prostate cancer: implications for oncology nurses
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10232144/
